titles.title: For the relief of Richard Steinmetz.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 9/18/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified amount to Richard Steinmetz of Vincentown, New Jersey, for services rendered and costs incurred in obtaining the ship's bell from the C.S.S. ALABAMA and returning that bell to the United States.
